A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it lacks the gravitas of the Original Trilogy\, (and even some of the more worthwhile elements of the Prequels which made them so endearing to a cult selection of fans)\, The Last Jedi is an interesting yet different edition to the Star Wars saga. While some elements of humour are out-of-place\, and some characters (namely Rose and Poe) could have been made a tad more likeable with a few revisions to the dialogue here or there\, the adventures into unknown regions of character\, world\, and lore make this film a great addition to the saga\, even if the runtime is a little liberal.
